Opus Front

Framework CSS para os desenvolvedores da Opus

  • Seções

  • Home
  • Base
  • Grid
  • Forms
  • Tabelas
  • Botões
  • Mensagens
  • Menus

Tabelas

O Opus Front traz alguns tipos de tabelas já prontos, bastanto apenas declarar a classe de CSS desejada no elemento table.


Tabela comum

# Nome Email Ano de Nascimento
1 Jose jose@email.com 1980
2 Joao joao@email.com 1985
3 Sebastião bastiao@email.com 1970
4 Mario mario@email.com 1983
5 Berenice berenice@email.com 1975 
 1
 2

35
36
37
38
39
40
41
42
<table class="table">
    <thead>
        <tr>
            <th>#</th>
            <th>Nome</th>
            <th>Email</th>
            <th>Ano de Nascimento</th>
        </tr>
    </thead>
    <tbody>
        <tr>
            <td>1</td>
            <td>Jose</td>
            <td>jose@email.com</td>
            <td>1980</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
            <td>2</td>
            <td>Joao</td>
            <td>joao@email.com</td>
            <td>1985</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
            <td>3</td>
            <td>Sebastião</td>
            <td>bastiao@email.com</td>
            <td>1970</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
            <td>4</td>
            <td>Mario</td>
            <td>mario@email.com</td>
            <td>1983</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
            <td>5</td>
            <td>Berenice</td>
            <td>berenice@email.com</td>
            <td>1975</td>
        </tr>
    </tbody>
</table>

<table class="table table--horizontal">
    <thead>
        <tr>
            <th>#</th>
            <th>Nome</th>
            <th>Email</th>
            <th>Ano de Nascimento</th>
        </tr>
    </thead>
    <tbody>
        <tr>
            <td>1</td>
            <td>Jose</td>
            <td>jose@email.com</td>
            <td>1980</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
            <td>2</td>
            <td>Joao</td>
            <td>joao@email.com</td>
            <td>1985</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
            <td>3</td>
            <td>Sebastião</td>
            <td>bastiao@email.com</td>
            <td>1970</td>
